synopsis.text: After the launch of the popular MMORPG 'The World,' players Minase Mai and Tomonari Kasumi are found unconscious in the real world following an enigmatic sound. While Mai quickly regains consciousness, her friend remains in a coma. As one of the seven affected players, Mai teams up with the game's creator, Tokuoka Junichiro, to unravel the mystery behind the game and the strange sound. With millions of players worldwide, the stakes are high as they delve into the virtual realm to save those trapped in a coma and prevent further harm. Meanwhile, a player known as Kite investigates the sudden surge in monster abilities within the game, unaware of the connection to the real world. As these unlikely allies unite, they embark on a perilous journey to expose the truth behind 'The World' and its creator.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
